allow:
Bash(/c/laragon/bin/mysql/mysql-8.4.3-winx64/bin/mysql.exe -u root -D pethelp -e "
SELECT 
  b.id,
  b.status,
  DATE_FORMAT(b.start_date, ''%d.%m.%Y %H:%i'') as data_od,
  DATE_FORMAT(b.end_date, ''%d.%m.%Y %H:%i'') as data_do,
  s.title as usluga,
  u.name as opiekun,
  p.name as zwierze,
  b.total_price as cena,
  b.special_instructions as uwagi
FROM bookings b
JOIN services s ON b.service_id = s.id  
JOIN users u ON b.sitter_id = u.id
JOIN pets p ON b.pet_id = p.id
WHERE b.owner_id = 7
ORDER BY b.start_date DESC;
")
Bash(/c/laragon/bin/mysql/mysql-8.4.3-winx64/bin/mysql.exe -u root -D pethelp -e "SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE id = 1;")
